me.enable2faDesc: Scan the QR code with your authenticator app or enter the key manually.
me.2faCodeDesc: Enter the code from your authenticator app.
me.disable2faDesc: Enter your password to disable Two Factor Authentication.

setup.welcome: Welcome to your first setup of wg-easy
setup.welcomeDesc: You have found the easiest way to install and manage WireGuard on any Linux host
setup.existingSetup: Do you have an existing setup?
setup.createAdminDesc: Please first enter an admin username and a strong secure password. This information will be used to log in to your administration panel.
setup.setupConfigDesc: Please enter the host and port information. This will be used for the client configuration when setting up WireGuard on their devices.
setup.setupMigrationDesc: Please provide the backup file if you want to migrate your data from your previous wg-easy version to your new setup.
setup.hostDesc: Public hostname clients will connect to
setup.portDesc: Public UDP port clients will connect to and WireGuard will listen on

login.rememberMeDesc: Stay logged after closing the browser
login.insecure: You can't log in with an insecure connection. Use HTTPS.

client.name: Name
client.expireDateDesc: Date the client will be disabled. Blank for permanent
client.deleteDialog1: Are you sure you want to delete
client.noPrivKey: This client has no known private key. Cannot create Configuration.
client.allowedIpsDesc: Which IPs will be routed through the VPN (overrides global config)
client.serverAllowedIpsDesc: Which IPs the server will route to the client
client.mtuDesc: Sets the maximum transmission unit (packet size) for the VPN tunnel
client.persistentKeepaliveDesc: Sets the interval (in seconds) for keep-alive packets. 0 disables it
client.hooksLeaveEmpty: Only for wg-quick. Otherwise, leave it empty
client.dnsDesc: DNS server clients will use (overrides global config)
client.endpointDesc: IP of the client from which the WireGuard connection is established

general.metricsPasswordDesc: Bearer Password for the metrics endpoint (password or argon2 hash)
general.jsonDesc: Route for metrics in JSON format

config.hostDesc: Public hostname clients will connect to (invalidates config)
config.portDesc: Public UDP port clients will connect to (invalidates config, you probably want to change Interface Port too)
config.allowedIpsDesc: Allowed IPs clients will use (global config)
config.dnsDesc: DNS server clients will use (global config)
config.mtuDesc: MTU clients will use (only for new clients)
config.persistentKeepaliveDesc: Interval in seconds to send keepalives to the server. 0 = disabled (only for new clients)
config.suggestDesc: Choose a IP-Address or Hostname for the Host field

interface.deviceDesc: Ethernet device the wireguard traffic should be forwarded through
interface.portDesc: UDP Port WireGuard will listen on (you probably want to change Config Port too)
interface.restartWarn: Are you sure to restart the interface? This will disconnect all clients.

admin.introText:
Welcome to the admin panel.

Here you can manage the general settings, the configuration, the interface settings and the hooks.

Start by choosing one of the sections in the sidebar.

user.name: Name
user.emailInvalid: Email must be a valid email

zod.body: Body must be a valid object
